text: Decimoputzu (Deximupùtzu) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 4,371 people lived there. Its area is 44.77 km². It is 17 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Decimoputzu
